itunes:title: Episode 723 - The Plot Against The President
title: Episode 723 - The Plot Against The President
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Director Amanda Milius, to discuss her #1 film "The Plot Against The President" about the 3 year Russia hoax that the Democrats funded to bring down Donald Trump.  She talks about how Amazon tri...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Director Amanda Milius, to discuss her #1 film "The Plot Against The President" about the 3 year Russia hoax that the Democrats funded to bring down Donald Trump.  She talks about how Amazon tried to prevent her movie from coming out, how quickly it became #1, her time working in the White House, and why she is helping out the legal team in Nevada for their votes to be thrown out.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Director Amanda Milius, to discuss her #1 film "The Plot Against The President" about the 3 year Russia hoax that the Democrats funded to bring down Donald Trump.  She talks about how Amazon tried to prevent her movie from coming out, how quickly it became #1, her time working in the White House, and why she is helping out the legal team in Nevada for their votes to be thrown out.
